abstract: A new app, Foliage Leaf Peepr, offers excellent general guidance to foliage fans wondering where to aim their car and camera.
snippet: A new app, Foliage Leaf Peepr, offers excellent general guidance to foliage fans wondering where to aim their car and camera.
lead_paragraph: Autumn may not have as many Facebook fans as summer. But it has a good app.

headline.main: Leaf Peeping? There's an App for That
